Note.Q: The word of the Lord came to Jonah son of Amittai: "Go to the great city of Nineveh and preach against it, because its wickedness has come up before me." But Jonah ran away from the Lord and headed for Tarshish. He went down to Joppa, where he found a ship bound for that port. After paying the fare, he went aboard and sailed for Tarshish to flee from the Lord.
Note.P: We run to ODD and UNSAFE places.
We start to confuse OPPORTUNITY with God's blessing.
God gets involved in our lives not to PAY us back, but to BRING us back.
He goes ahead and WAITS for you.
